pr_title: [CDAP-17053] Add search functionality on secure keys (Secure Key Manager)

timeline.bodyText: I don't think you need a copyToClipboard for description of the secure key. I think if you want to add this feature, it's better for the name, because that is what is going to be used in pipelines
timeline.author: elfenheart

replies.bodyText: temporarily deleted Details view, may add it after further discussion with lea.
replies.author: jennac3

timeline.bodyText: you might want to normalize the key and searchText first (ie. lower case them) so that the search is case insensitive
timeline.author: elfenheart

timeline.bodyText: I don't think you need a details view for secure keys. Can the detail view and the edit mode be combined? There's not a lot of information needed to be shown
timeline.author: elfenheart

timeline.message: [CDAP-17053] Add search functionality on secure keys (Secure Key Manager)
[CDAP-17053] Add search functionality on secure keys (Secure Key Manager)
